1: -module(basic_SUITE).
    2: 
    3: -compile(export_all).
    4: 
    5: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
    6: -include_lib("eunit/include/eunit.hrl").
    7: 
    8: all() ->
    9:   [
   10:     ed_ad_test
   11:   ].
   12: 
   13: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   14:   Config.
   15: 
   16: init_per_testcase(_, Config) ->
   17:   Config.
   18: 
   19: end_per_testcase(_, Config) ->
   20:   Config.
   21: 
   22: end_per_suite(Config) ->
   23:   Config.
   24: 
   25: 
   26: basic_test_(V) ->
   27:   fun () ->
   28:     E = cryPack:encode(V),
   29:     {ok, D, _} = cryPack:decode(E),
   30:     ?assertEqual(V, D)
   31:   end.
   32: 
   33: ed_ad_test(_Config) ->
   34:   lists:foreach(
   35:     fun(X) ->
   36:       basic_test_(X)
   37:     end,
   38:     [[], #{}, true, false, 12345, 3.14, <<12345:32/integer>>, [[], #{}, true, false, <<12345:32/integer>>], #{key1 => value, key2 => 12345}]
   39:   ).
